ضمير متصل.desc: Pronoun attached to a word to indicate possession or object.

ضمير منفصل.desc: Standalone pronoun used as subject or focus.

اسم فاعل.desc: Indicates the doer of an action.

اسم مفعول.desc: Indicates the receiver of an action.

مرفوع.desc: Case marking for subjects and certain predicates.

منصوب.desc: Case marking for direct objects and adverbs.

مجرور.desc: Case after prepositions and in iḍāfa constructs.

المبتدأ.desc: The starting noun in a nominal sentence.

الخبر.desc: Completes or describes the subject in a nominal sentence.

اسم موصول.desc: Connects a clause to a noun (e.g., الذي، التي).

حرف جر.desc: Causes genitive case on the following noun.
